item.title: Help with bluurrs client prolly easy answer but idk@@!@!@!&@(*!&##@)(*)#
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

k so whever i try to log in on my server it dcs me like right away so ive been told from bluurr to do this

Quote from bluurrâ€”

Add this to your server

open player.java

add

Code:
public int skulls = 0;
public int hint = 0;

find

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

make it look like

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

But i dont get where to add the first part so some help please. It says in player.java but where in player.java? Also if u have a 317 client that has customs (and maybe if u know it works with pvp planet would be nice lol) just let me know a dl link.

Read full topic
